<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/cgi/session.pl"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve session cookie for writing operations.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"user_id":{"type":"string","description":"Username for login"},"password":{"type":"string","description":"Password for login","format":"password"}},"required":["user_id","password"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful login","headers":{"Set-Cookie":{"schema":{"type":"string","description":"Session cookie for subsequent authenticated requests"},"examples":{"sessionCookie":{"value":"session=user123&testuser&user_session&abcdef1234567890; domain=.example.net; path=/; SameSite=Lax"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Authentication failed"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
